resources.string: Barukh ata Adonai Eloheinu Melekh ha\'Olam asher kid\'shanu b\'mitzvotav v\'tizivanu al sefirat ha\'omer.
(Blessing skipped - should have said it last night!)
(Say the following BEFORE SUNSET):\nToday is the {DAY} day of the omer.
(Say the following BEFORE SUNSET):\nToday is the {DAY} day, which is {WEEK}, of the omer.
(Say the following AFTER SUNSET):\nToday is the {DAY} day of the omer.
(Say the following AFTER SUNSET):\nToday is the {DAY} day, which is {WEEK}, of the omer.
To add the widget to your home screen, long-click on a blank 4x1 space on your home screen, select Add, Widgets, then Counting the Omer!
Click below for more info on counting the omer
